title: The squire of Alsatia a comedy, as it is acted by Their Majesty's servants / written by Tho. Shadwell.
author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
notes: Prologue to the Squire of Alsatia also appears separately at reel 1622:16 identified as Wing S2865.
Reproduction of original in Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
